彭博資訊報導，花旗集團計劃退出包括台灣在內的亞洲、歐洲、中東及北非等13國市場的零售銀行業務。

花旗15日說，將退出在澳洲、巴林、中國大陸、印度、印尼、南韓、馬來西亞、菲律賓、台灣、泰國、越南、波蘭及俄羅斯的消費者特許經營。

Unfortunately, after much consideration, we are not able to offer you a position at this time. However, we hope that this will not be the last time we connect. We invite you to keep in touch with Citi and check back periodically throughout the course of your career in case a position of better fit arises.

Our list of available opportunities can be found by visiting: oncampus.citi.com
We sincerely appreciate your interest in Citi, and wish you much success in the future.

All the best,
Citi Global Campus Talent Acquisition Team
